title: Best of the Program | Guests: Sen. Mike Lee & Matt Ridley | 1/14/22
description:
Sen. Mike Lee joins to discuss the SCOTUS decision that shot down President Biden’s vaccine mandate. Bill O’Reilly joins for his weekly news recap, including President Biden’s first-year failures, a possible Hillary Clinton presidential run, and Dr. Fauci. Author and biologist Matt Ridley joins Glenn to discuss the leaked Dr. Fauci emails regarding the origins of COVID.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
